front.title: CMVP approved sensitive parameter generation and establishment methods

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: NIST Special Publication (SP) 800-140D replaces the approved sensitive security parameter generation and establishment methods requirements of ISO/IEC 19790 Annex D. As a validation authority, the Cryptographic Module Validation Program (CMVP) may supersede this Annex in its entirety. This document supersedes ISO/IEC 19790 Annex D and ISO/IEC 24759 paragraph 6.16.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
